about_the_game:
Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks


Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping, high-speed racing experience in Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks! Strap in and take control of your mini car as you navigate through thrilling aerial tracks filled with ramps, twists, and turns.

Race against AI-generated cars in an action-packed journey through the skies, collecting stars to increase your score and unlock different cars for use. Master the art of aerial maneuvers, hitting ramps, catching air, and soaring through the tracks to gain an edge over your opponents.

Key Features:

High-Flying Racing:

 Experience heart-pounding races high above ground level on mesmerizing tracks.

Star Collection:

 Gather stars scattered throughout the tracks to boost your score and unlock a variety of different cars for enhanced gameplay.

Level Completion:

 Finish levels to unlock new tracks and challenges, advancing further in the aerial racing adventure.

Aerial Stunts:

 Perform daring stunts and maneuvers by hitting ramps and soaring through the air.

Immersive Experience:

 For an enhanced experience, Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks is configured to seamlessly integrate with Perspectacles head tracking glasses. Immerse yourself fully in the game as Perspectacles elevate the thrill of high-flying racing to new heights, offering an unparalleled level of immersion and control.

Join the competition, master the tracks, and become the ultimate Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks champion. Unlock new cars, conquer levels, and soar through the skies in this exhilarating racing adventure!
Note: Perspectacles head tracking glasses are recommended for an immersive experience but not required to play the game.
detailed_description:
Enhanced for Perspectacles:

This game is optimized for Perspectacles, exclusive spatial tech glasses. While not required, they offer enhanced features.
To learn more or purchase Perspectacles, visit 3Di World.

name: Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Race through the skies, master aerial stunts, and unlock cars in Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks. Collect stars, conquer levels, and enhance immersion with optional Perspectacles head tracking glasses. Become the champion of high-speed, airborne racing! Pick a car and give it a GO!
